meta_description: {hackathonName}. $15,000 in prizes. Build the future of private, trustless applications on Starknet. February 1 - February 28, 2026.
og_description: $15,000 in prizes. Build private, trustless applications on Starknet.
hero_subtitle_line1: Join the Bitcoin Privacy Revolution: Build trustless apps on Starknet, win $15k, and fast-track to funding. Limited spots—claim yours!
hero_subtitle_privacy: Focus on Privacy: Master ZK proofs and build trustless apps on Starknet.
hero_countdown_urgency: Register early on DoraHacks for exclusive workshops!
section_why_title: Why 2026 is the Year for Privacy
stat_1_label: StarkWare's fastest ZK prover deployed on Starknet mainnet in 2025, delivering 100x efficiency gains to enable scalable privacy, faster proofs, lower costs, and new confidential use cases like shielded transactions and private DeFi
stat_2_label: BTC staked natively on Starknet through trustless staking, powering BTCFi with real yields, liquid staking, and Bitcoin-backed DeFi without wrappers or soft forks
stat_3_label: Starknet's programmable privacy layer integrating Zcash shielding with Cairo smart contracts, enabling quantum-safe, confidential compute for Bitcoin-integrated apps
quote_1_text: The next 8 years in crypto will be the Privacy Era.
quote_1_cite: — Balaji Srinivasan, The 3 Eras of Crypto podcast, January 1, 2026
quote_2_text: Privacy is the one feature that's critical for the world's finance to move onchain.
quote_2_cite: — a16z crypto, "17 things we're excited about for crypto in 2026", December 2025
story_blurb: From solo hacker to funded founder: Past winners landed $100k+ grants. Your privacy breakthrough starts Feb 1.
section_tracks_subtitle: $15,000 total prize pool from Starknet Foundation
section_details_subtitle: Preview what's on DoraHacks – full rules, timelines, and more.
details_timeline_a: Registration: Jan 15 - Feb 1, 2026. Hacking: Feb 1-28. Submissions due: Feb 28, 23:59 UTC. Judging: Mar 1-10. Winners announced: Mar 15.
details_eligibility_a: Open to all (18+), no geo restrictions (except sanctioned countries). Teams up to 5 members. All skill levels welcome.
details_submissions_a: Via DoraHacks: Include GitHub repo, demo video (≤3 min), and Starknet testnet/mainnet deployment. Must be original work created during the hackathon.
details_judging_a: Innovation & Creativity (40%): How original is the idea? Technical Execution (30%): How well-built and complex? Impact on Privacy/Bitcoin (20%): Real-world value? Completeness & User Experience (10%): Functional and intuitive?
details_prizes_a: Per track: 1st $3k, 2nd $2k, 3rd $1k in STRK/USDC. Paid to wallet within 30 days. Winners fast-tracked to accelerator.
details_ip_rules_a: You retain ownership. Grant non-exclusive license for promotion. Follow DoraHacks code of conduct (no harassment, inclusive). Original work only.
details_support_a: DoraHacks forums, Discord channels, mentor office hours, and AI tools. Check 'Resources' tab on DoraHacks.
track_privacy_description: Build privacy-preserving applications using STARKs, zero-knowledge proofs, and confidential transactions on Starknet.
track_bitcoin_description: Create trustless Bitcoin bridges, OP_CAT applications, and BTC-native DeFi leveraging Starknet's security.
track_open_description: Build anything innovative on Starknet. Gaming, social, infrastructure—surprise us.
resources_subtitle: New to Starknet? Choose your track and start building.
resource_bitcoin_description: Build trustless BTC bridges and OP_CAT apps
resource_privacy_description: Master ZK proofs and confidential transactions
support_academy_description: Free Cairo courses and documentation to get you building fast
support_ai_description: AI-powered assistance for debugging, ideation, and project review
support_mentors_description: Direct access to ecosystem experts for technical guidance
testimonial_1_quote: “The best hackathon I’ve joined in years — the mentorship alone is worth it.”
testimonial_2_quote: “We shipped a working BTC bridge prototype in two weeks.”
testimonial_3_quote: “The privacy track pushed our team into production-grade ZK.”
testimonial_4_quote: “Starknet resources were tight, clear, and actually useful.”
testimonial_5_quote: “The best prize pool-to-effort ratio I’ve seen this year.”
faq_1_a: Anyone! Solo developers and teams up to 5 members. No geographic restrictions. All skill levels welcome.
faq_2_q: Do I need to know Cairo?
faq_2_a: Not required to start. We provide learning resources through Starknet Academy and DoraHacks AI assistance.
faq_3_a: Winners get fast-tracked to Starknet Foundation's accelerator program with $25k-$500k grant pipeline and VC introductions.
faq_4_a: Yes. Build at your own pace. Submit on DoraHacks by February 28, 2026.
faq_submit_q: How do I submit my project?
faq_submit_a: All submissions via DoraHacks platform—include GitHub repo, demo video (≤3 min), and Starknet deployment link. Deadline: Feb 28, 2026, 23:59 UTC.
faq_questions_q: What if I have questions during the hack?
faq_questions_a: Use DoraHacks' built-in forums, our Discord, or schedule mentor calls. Check the 'Resources' tab on DoraHacks for live sessions.
faq_prizes_a: In STRK/USDC to your wallet within 30 days post-announcement. Taxes are your responsibility—details in DoraHacks terms.
final_cta_subtitle: Join the biggest privacy hackathon of 2026. 4 weeks. $15,000. Your future.
